item.description:
RELEASE INFO: * Prevent UI thread from being locked while installing mods * Small localization fixes * Speed up UI when renaming\duplicating large collections * Fix notification CTD when invoking from an invalid thread * Fix issue with overlay not being removed when launching game (but not closing Irony) * Conflict Solver and Advanced Merge fixes * Fix definition priority evaluation in cases where a definition was overwritten by a file and no longer present
CHANGES FROM v1.7: * Various bugfixes * Upgrade dependencies * Show more information in hash report and optimize performance by switching to listbox controls * Hopefully fix GUI corruption in linux workspaces (without upgrading avalonia to latest version) * Update Stellaris parser map for Stellaris v2.8

CHANGES FROM v1.7: * Various bugfixes * Upgrade dependencies * Show more information in hash report and optimize performance by switching to listbox controls * Hopefully fix GUI corruption in linux workspaces (without upgrading avalonia to latest version) * Update Stellaris parser map for Stellaris v2.8
